participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring, organized, and family-oriented with a passion for learning and adventure.
participant_1.background: I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door. I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy. I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn. I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program. I work hard to provide for my family and enjoy spending time with my kids and dog.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, creative, and introspective with a love for nature and the arts.
participant_2.background: I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family. I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths. I want to share my photography with the world. I eat healthy meals and cook at home to make sure I am making the best choices for my health. I like photography.

content.text: Good morning! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I have a lot to do today, but I'm excited to get started.
Sounds like a busy day! What are you up to?
I have a few errands to run, then I'm going to meet up with some friends for dinner. What about you?
I'm just going to relax today. I'm going to read a book and watch some movies.
That sounds like a nice way to spend the day! I love reading sci-fi space adventures. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm really into photography right now. I've been taking pictures of interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
That's really cool! I love photography too. I have a lot of pictures of my kids and dog.
It's always great to capture special moments.
Yeah, it's nice to look back on them and remember the good times.
I'm glad you have such a great family.
You're welcome! I have to go now, but it was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day
